An adjacency matrix representation of a graph
is an integer matrix, then entry
in the matrix is interpreted as the number of parallel edges joining vertices
in the graph. If it is False, then the entries in the matrix are interpreted as the weight of a single edge joining the vertices.
Graph type to create. If graph instance, then cleared before populated.
Name of edge attribute to store matrix numeric value. The data will have the same type as the matrix entry (int, float, (real,imag)).
Creates a new graph from an adjacency matrix given as a SciPy sparse matrix.
